title: Best Fiends v1.2.1 [Unlimited Energy/Gems]
description:
Description
Collect all Best Fiends, level them up, discover their special powers and battle the Slugs of Mount Boom. Get ready for the slime of your life!
STORY:
"Help the Best Fiends save their families in a battle with the Slugs of Mount Boom!"
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony, until the night the meteor smashed into Mount Boom! A strange force transformed the slimy Slugs who lived there into a gang of greenery-gobbling goons Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and now, the Slugs captured the Best FiendsÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ families!
To fight back the Slugs and reunite their families, the Best Fiends have to grow and level up, discover their special powers and prepare for the mystery that awaits at Mount Boom.
To get to Mount Boom, theyÃƒÂ¢Ã‚â‚¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll need to becomeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ the Best Fiends.

FEATURES:
* FIENDISH PUZZLES Easy to play, hard to master. Approachable puzzle gameplay taken to the next level!
* DAZZLING GRAPHICS and finger-tapping music!
* EPIC STORYLINE Join the Best Fiends on their epic journey through the Ã¢â‚¬Â¨majestic world of Minutia!
* COLLECT & LEVEL UP Collect all Best Fiends and discover their special powers!
* NEVER GET STUCK You can always level up your characters and power through even the most difficult challenges!
* THE BEST OF TWO WORLDS Line matching puzzle game with RPG-like character development!
* JOIN THE BATTLE against the Slugs of Mount Boom!
* STAY TUNED More levels, characters and gameplay variations are on the way!

What's New
* More slugs on boats!
* 10 wet and wild NEW levels added to the Ominous Ocean.
Coming soon: Rumor has it, there will be something hot in the air...
Please rate Best Fiends after you update - Your feedback really help us make Best Fiends the best game experience possible!
